entry.title: Leaf Silicone Ashtray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Ashtray
Price: 5.99

The Leaf Silicone Ashtray has a fun, eye-catching design that complements any decor. It features a stylish leaf shape and is made of durable, food-grade silicone.

This ashtray features notched rests in the lip so you can safely park your smoke while the ash collects neatly in the tray. It has a non-slip bottom to keep it in place and is virtually unbreakable.

The Leaf Silicon Ashtray provides quality and style at an affordable price. Designed for everyday use, it’s flexible, non-slip, and easy to clean.  It merges form with function and makes a perfect gift for smokers everywhere.

Product dimensions: 135mm x 130mm x 30mm

  • Attractive leaf design
  • Unbreakable food-grade silicone
  • Non-slip bottom
  • Suitable for indoor & outdoor use

entry.title: Newport Zero Side Torch Lighters –Assorted Long – 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Newport
Type: Lighter
Price: 44.99

Looking for the best butane torch lighters? Looks like you’ve come to the right place!

Newport Zero Side Torch Lighters are simple, safe, and ergonomically designed to get the job done. The compact size lets this portable torch fit into slim jeans or small bags with ease. Auto ignition means that you get a strong, effortless flame every time, and the high max. burn temp. make this ideal for dabs and concentrates. This convenient model features expanded butane capacity so you can use it for longer and refill less frequently.

  • Auto Ignition
  • 2300°C Burn Temp.
  • Safety Lock
  • Ergonomic Design
  • Extended Burner Head
  • Expanded Butane Capacity
  • Fully Refillable
  • Windproof Flame
  • POP Display Tray Included

For durable, quality lighters that can go the distance, try Newport Torches! After all, every smoker should have at least one very nice lighter. Just remember to ask for it back!

entry.title: Round Glow-in-the-Dark Silicone Ashtray – Assorted
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Ashtray
Price: 3.49

The Round Glow-in-the-Dark Silicone Ashtray has a balanced, modern design that complements any decor. It features a solid matte glow-in-the-dark body and is made of durable, food-grade silicone that glows in the dark after being exposed to light.

This ashtray is 23mm tall and measures 83mm in diameter. It features four notched rests in the lip so you can safely park your smoke while the ash collects neatly in the tray. It has a non-slip bottom to keep it in place and is virtually unbreakable.

This Round Glow-in-the-Dark Ashtray provides quality and style at an affordable price. Designed for everyday use, it’s flexible, non-slip, and easy to clean.  It merges form with function and makes a perfect gift for smokers everywhere.

Product dimensions: Diameter 83mm, Height 23mm

  • Solid glow-in-the-dark style
  • Classic round design
  • Unbreakable food-grade silicone
  • Non-slip bottom
  • Suitable for indoor & outdoor use

entry.title: Boveda 2-Way Humidity Packs – Individually Wrapped 4g – Box of 125
entry.summary:
Vendor: Boveda
Type: Humidity Control
Price: 129.90

Protect those precious aromas and flavors with Boveda 2-Way Humidity Packs, the Original Terpene Shield™! Boveda Humidity Packs are designed to provide an optimal 62% relative humidity, which prevents terpene evaporation and keep buds looking and tasting their absolute freshest!

  • Patented 2-Way Humidity Control
  • Prevents Terpene Evaporation
  • Individually Wrapped for Convenience
  • Trusted Global Leader
  • Multi-purpose with Many Uses
  • Available in 4g and 8g Sizes

Did you know? Even in an airtight container, your buds can continue to lose flavor and aroma due to terpene evaporation.

Protect your stash with Boveda 2-Way Humidity Packs! Their patented 2-way humidity control system is available in different sizes according to your needs. It’s as simple as including a humidity pack in your favorite cannabis container.

Boveda Humidity Packs create the Original Terpene Shield™ to protect your terpenes! Boveda creates a monolayer of purified water to encase your flower and keep your terps freshly intact until you’re ready to roll.

With Boveda, you can take pride in enjoying truly fresh flower every time. Protect your terps and level-up your storage game with world-class humidity control from Boveda.

entry.title: Herbal Chef™ Stove Top Butter Maker
entry.summary:
Vendor: Herbal Chef
Type: Butter Machine
Price: 29.90 - 39.90 (3 variants)

Take the confusion out on infusion!

Save time, waste less, and make less mess with the Stove Top Butter Maker from Herbal Chef!

  • Sleek Stainless-Steel Body
  • Heat-Resistant Handle
  • Flared Spout for Easy Pouring
  • Available in 2 Stick (L) and 4 Stick (XL) Capacity

This stainless-steel stovetop butter maker is available is two different sizes and conveniently works with full sticks of butter! You’ll be whipping up your cannabutter in less time, with little waste, and while using far fewer dishes than traditional methods. The Herbal Chef Butter Maker features a heat-resistant handle and a flared spout for easy pouring. It’s easy to use and compatible with any stove top, even induction. Full butter infusion can be achieved in as little as 10 minutes! Herbal Chef does the work to save you time!

For making exquisite edibles with ease, try the Herbal Chef Stove Top Butter Maker today!

entry.title: Clipper Lighters – Metallic – 48/Tray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Clipper
Type: Lighter
Price: 47.30

Clipper lighters have been a mainstay stoner essential for years. They’re durable, refillable, and feature an iconic design loved by smokers everywhere. They even include removable flits which double as a poking tool, making them a perfect companion for rollers and pipe users alike.

This assorted set of lighters feature a metallic finish in four colours and come in a convenient POP display tray of 48.

  • Durable
  • Refillable
  • Removable Flint
  • Fixed Flame
  • Nylon Body
  • Child-resistant Mechanism

entry.title: Orange Chronic Cleaner – [4oz, 12oz, 16oz]
entry.summary:
Vendor: orange chronic
Type: Cleaner
Price: 2.90 - 7.50 (3 variants)

Give your best pieces a zesty clean with the original Orange Chronic Cleaner! Available in three convenient sizes.

Nothing ruins a good bowl quite like bad bong taste or the smell of a stale pipe. Get your most-loved pieces hitting like new again with Organic Chronic Cleaner: the natural solution for all your bong and pipe cleaning needs.

Orange Chronic Cleaner works on contact and yields immediate results. Simply pour a small amount into your piece and swirl it around. No scrubbing or soaking required! Also, it’s free-rinsing and has no harsh chemical smells or aftertaste! Say goodbye to mysterious dark stains and rancid resin. Say hello to fresh, orangey goodness!

Orange Chronic Cleaner is Earth-friendly, easy to use, and will brighten your glass like nobody’s business. Try today!

  • Immediate results
  • No Scrubbing or waiting
  • No After Taste or Smell
  • Easy to Use
  • Earth Friendly
  • Free Rinsing
  • Brightens Glass
